photos.caption: A tray of Yarrow seedlings
photos.altText: Half a dozen yarrow seedlings on a seedling tray. Each seedling has 3 or 4 light green leaves at most an inch tall

photos.caption: A bushy and mostly established Yarrow from the garden
photos.altText: A wide, bushy, and unruley yarrow plant fills the center of the photo. It has dozens long stems coming from the center of the plant, with small dark and light green leaves along the length of each stem

photos.caption: A 'Paprika' Yarrow in bloom. The white and pink buds are flowers that are still growing.
photos.altText: A yarrow plant with crimson red flowers in bloom. There are many clusters of these flowers in full bloom. Some flower clusters are just white and pink buds
